import sqlite3

def calculate_average_rating(movie_id):
    conn = sqlite3.connect('movies.db')
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    query = 'SELECT AVG(Rating) FROM Movies WHERE Movie_ID = ?'
    cursor.execute(query, (movie_id,))
